Title: The Jewel of the Nile
Writer: Mark Rosenthal, Lawrence Konner, Diane Thomas (characters)
Actors: Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito, Spyros Fokas
Plot: When Joan Wilder is abducted while on a trip along the Nile, her boyfriend, Jack Colton, and pal Ralph rush to rescue her and retrieve a fabled jewel.
